markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Ozem Experience](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=311)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 73

 

</column>

You or someone close to you worked with the Knights of Ozem before Lastwall fell. In addition to knowledge of the organization's tenets and goals, you have germane understanding of the order's history. You believe there are valuable lessons in the Knights of Ozem's exploits.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength
or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Warfare Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Courtly Graces](/Feats.aspx?ID=772) skill feat.
name: Ozem Experience

text: Ozem Experience Source Knights of Lastwall pg. 73 You or someone close to you worked with the Knights of Ozem before Lastwall fell. In addition to knowledge of the organization's tenets and goals, you have germane understanding of the order's history. You believe there are valuable lessons in the Knights of Ozem's exploits. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Society skill, and the Warfare Lore skill. You gain the Courtly Graces skill feat.
